name: Cities, Urbanization and Development
description: This course will introduce students to urban social processes, urban form and urban history. A particular emphasis will be placed on global urbanization, internal spatial and social structure of cities, as well as past and contemporary urban problems. [36L, 12T ]
exclusions: GGR124H1, combination of any of the following two:GGRA03H3, GGRB05H3, GGRC10H3
